item.title: Altice 称正考虑竞购以色列炙手可热的电信部门
item.description: 随着亿万富翁帕特里克-德拉希（Patrick Drahi）出售其帝国的部分资产，Altice International 表示其以色列业务 Hot Telecommunication Systems Ltd. 已收到报价。【原文：Altice International said it’s gotten an offer for its Israeli business, Hot Telecommunication Systems Ltd., as billionaire owner Patrick Drahi sells down parts of his empire.】

item.title: 中国人工智能芯片领导者警告股票狂热后的交易风险
item.description: 中国人工智能芯片制造商汇川技术公司（Cambricon Technologies Corp.【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence chipmaker Cambricon Technologies Corp. issued a warning to investors about elevated trading risks after its shares more than doubled in one month.】

item.title: 化肥价格飙升，关税令热爱特朗普的农民倍感压力
item.description: 化肥价格飙升，侵蚀了美国农民的利润，也增加了特朗普政府削减关键作物养分关税的压力。【原文：Fertilizer prices are surging, eroding American farmers’ profits and adding pressure on the Trump administration to slash tariffs on key crop nutrients.】

item.title: Desjardins 收购 Guardian，打造价值 2030 亿加元的加拿大基金管理公司
item.description: Desjardins 集团将以 17 亿加元（12 亿美元）的全现金交易将 Guardian Capital Group Ltd. 私有化，从而加强这家魁北克合作公司在全球资产管理业务中的地位。【原文：Desjardins Group will take Guardian Capital Group Ltd. private in a C$1.7 billion ($1.2 billion) all-cash deal, bolstering the Quebec cooperative’s position in the global asset management business.】

item.title: 经济低迷，瑞典寻求在大选年增加支出
item.description: 在这个北欧最大的国家进入大选年之际，瑞典政府正准备采取财政措施，使陷入困境的经济重新增长。【原文：The Swedish government is preparing a fiscal push to get the struggling economy growing again as the largest Nordic state heads into an election year.】

item.title: 在摩根大通工作 23 年后，加雷尔离开摩根大通，转投杠杆融资领域的竞争对手
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，泽夫-加雷尔（Zev Garell）在离开摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）23 年后，加入了巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的杠杆融资团队。【原文：Zev Garell has left JPMorgan Chase & Co. after 23 years to join Barclays Plc’s leveraged finance team, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易战使加拿大经常账户赤字创历史新高
item.description: 由于贸易争端导致加拿大对美国的出口下降，加拿大第二季度的经常账户赤字创下历史之最。【原文：Canada’s current account deficit reached the widest on record in the second quarter as the country’s exports to the US dropped because of the trade dispute.】

item.title: 华尔街权衡英伟达不温不火的前景，美国股市动荡不安
item.description: 美国股市周四在小幅上涨和下跌之间徘徊，全球最大的芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：US stocks flipped between small gains and losses on Thursday, with Nvidia Corp. keeping broader gains in check after the world’s largest chipmaker’s data center revenue missed Wall Street estimates in the latest quarter.】

item.title: 美国成屋待售再次下降，原因是经济承受能力受到限制
item.description: 由于潜在购房者对依然高企的房价和借贷成本望而却步，美国 7 月份的现房待售量连续第二个月下降，这与房地产市场的低迷是一致的。【原文：US pending sales of existing homes fell for a second month in July as potential buyers balked at still-elevated prices and borrowing costs, consistent with a sluggish housing market.】

item.title: 葡萄酒厂和威士忌酒厂利用私人信贷融资
item.description: 酒厂、酒类经销商和酿酒厂正在转向私人信贷进行融资，尤其是在关税和饮酒习惯下降给酒类行业带来更多风险的情况下。【原文：Wineries, booze distributors and distilleries are turning to private credit for financing, especially as tariffs and a decline in drinking habits bring more risk to the alcohol industry.】

item.title: 瑞典将废除铀矿开采禁令，核电建设迫在眉睫
item.description: 瑞典政府提议取消铀矿开采禁令，以减少对进口的需求，因为该国正着眼于核电复兴。【原文：The Swedish government proposed to remove a ban on uranium mining to reduce the need for imports as the country eyes a renaissance in nuclear power.】

item.title: 中远船务警告持续的地缘政治风险给前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 中远船务控股有限公司（Cosco Shipping Holdings Co.【原文：Cosco Shipping Holdings Co. managed to increase profit in a volatile environment for freight rates and said uncertainty about tariff policies will continue to pose challenges for the industry.】

item.title: 丽莎-库克就特朗普将其赶出美联储董事会一事起诉特朗普
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）提起诉讼，质疑唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统解雇她的企图，称她在抵押贷款申请中撒谎，从而揭开了一场关于美国中央银行独立性的历史性斗争。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook filed a lawsuit challenging President Donald Trump’s attempt to fire her over claims she lied on mortgage applications, kicking off a historic fight over independence of the US central bank.】

item.title: 短期国债下跌，因为美国数据强劲削弱了利率押注
item.description: 在强劲的美国经济增长和就业数据使市场对美联储将在年底前两次降息的信念略有动摇之后，短期国债小幅下跌。【原文：Short-maturity Treasuries fell slightly after strong US economic growth and employment data made a small dent in the market’s conviction the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates twice by year-end.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 Adnoc 出价 3.28 亿美元收购物流部门股份
item.description: 阿布扎比国家能源公司正寻求通过二次出售其物流部门的股份来筹集约 12 亿迪拉姆（约合 3.28 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s state energy company is seeking to raise about 1.2 billion dirhams ($328 million) through a secondary share sale in its logistics arm.】

item.title: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）因比特币溢价下跌而受到市场反弹的打击
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的比特币实验曾一度备受赞誉，如今却陷入了市场反弹的泥潭，这让人们对他开创的企业-财政模式的可持续性产生了疑问。【原文：Michael Saylor’s once-celebrated Bitcoin experiment is mired in a market backlash, raising questions about the sustainability of the corporate-treasury model he pioneered.】

item.title: Figma 的竞争对手 Framer 以 20 亿美元的估值获得风险投资
item.description: Framer 是一家生产自动化网页设计工具的荷兰公司，该公司以 20 亿美元的估值进行了一轮融资。【原文：Framer, a Dutch company that makes tools for automating web design, has raised a funding round at a $2 billion valuation.】

item.title: 玻利维亚候选者在业界质疑声中掘金锂矿
item.description: 玻利维亚二十年来首位民选右翼总统的候选人承诺，在经历了十多年的虚假开端之后，将启动对世界上最大的锂矿床的开采。【原文：The man vying to become Bolivia’s first elected right-wing president in two decades is promising to kick-start exploitation of the world’s joint-biggest lithium deposits after more than a decade of false starts.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织二号人物就 "脆弱 "的债券市场和债务问题的自满情绪发出警告
item.description: 国际货币基金组织副总裁吉塔-戈皮纳特（Gita Gopinath）警告说，不要对全球经济的借贷水平沾沾自喜，她说债券市场 "正处于一个脆弱的地方"。【原文：International Monetary Fund Deputy Managing Director Gita Gopinath warned against complacency over levels of borrowing in the global economy, saying that bond markets are “in a fragile place.”】

item.title: 减记抵消金属价格上涨的影响，西班业公司亏损缩小
item.description: Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. 上半年的亏损有所收窄，原因是南非贵金属矿山利润的增加部分抵消了资产减记。【原文：Sibanye Stillwater Ltd.’s first-half loss narrowed as asset writedowns were partly offset by higher profits from its precious metals mines in South Africa.】

item.title: 投资强劲，美国经济扩张率修正为 3.3
item.description: 由于商业投资的回升和贸易的大幅推动，美国第二季度的经济扩张速度略快于最初的估计。【原文：The US economy expanded in the second quarter at a slightly faster pace than initially estimated on a pickup in business investment and an outsize boost from trade.】

item.title: 美国上周初请失业金人数降至22.9万
item.description: 上周美国失业救济金申请人数略有下降，表明雇主在经济不确定的情况下仍在留住现有工人。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits edged down last week, suggesting employers are holding onto current workers amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 美国铁路公司在多年延误后首次推出新型高速 Acela 列车
item.description: 美国国铁周四开始在连接华盛顿、纽约和波士顿的东北走廊沿线运营其新的高速列车车队，该项目耗资 23.5 亿美元，已拖延多年。【原文：Amtrak began operating its new high-speed train fleet on Thursday along the Northeast Corridor linking Washington, New York and Boston, a $2.35 billion project that was delayed for years.】

item.title: 英力士将夹克制造商 Belstaff 卖给安迪-穆雷支持的 Castore
item.description: 英力士集团控股公司（Ineos Group Holdings SA）将摩托车夹克制造商贝尔斯塔夫（Belstaff）出售给卡斯托雷公司（Castore），并在安迪-穆雷（Andy Murray）支持的运动装品牌中参股，作为交易的一部分。【原文：Ineos Group Holdings SA offloaded motorcycle jacket maker Belstaff to Castore and took a stake in the Andy Murray-backed sportswear brand as part of the deal.】

item.title: 特朗普叫停风力发电场引发历史新低后，纽约对冲基金扩大对奥尔斯特德的投资
item.description: 本周早些时候，当陷入困境的丹麦风电场开发商 Orsted A/S 的股价跌至历史最低点时，一家纽约对冲基金认为这是买入的好时机。【原文：When shares of beleaguered Danish wind farm developer Orsted A/S plunged to a record low earlier this week, one New York hedge fund decided it was a good time to buy.】

item.title: 狩猎公司将在欧洲裁员三分之一，重点转向中东地区
item.description: Hunting Plc 计划裁减三分之一的欧洲工作岗位，因为这家石油和天然气行业的供应商在北海钻探预期减弱的情况下将重点转向中东。【原文：Hunting Plc plans to cut a third of its European jobs as the supplier to oil and gas industries shifts focus to the Middle East amid expectations of weaker North Sea drilling.】

item.title: AMEA 和 Cox 将在安哥拉建造价值 2 亿美元的海水淡化厂
item.description: 总部设在迪拜的可再生能源公司AMEA Power与西班牙水和能源公司Cox Abg Group计划在安哥拉建造一座海水淡化厂，耗资超过2亿美元。【原文：AMEA Power, a Dubai-based renewable-energy company, and Spanish water and energy firm Cox Abg Group plan to build a seawater desalination plant in Angola that will cost more than $200 million.】

item.title: 德桑蒂斯推出 "佛罗里达州房产税法案"（Florida DOGE），试图取消房产税
item.description: 罗恩-德桑蒂斯（Ron DeSantis）正试图完成他将佛罗里达州改造成保守派天堂的计划，这也许是他迄今为止最冒险的赌注：一场在很大程度上取消房产税的运动。【原文：Ron DeSantis is seeking to complete his project of remaking Florida into a conservative paradise with perhaps his riskiest wager yet: a campaign to largely wipe out property taxes.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员认为 7 月份通胀风险 "大致平衡
item.description: 欧洲中央银行大多数官员认为通胀风险 "大体平衡"，他们对消费者价格的展望保持不变。【原文：Most European Central Bank officials deemed risks to inflation to be “broadly balanced,” with their outlook for consumer prices remaining in place, according to an account of their July meeting.】

item.title: 巴西警方严厉打击 42 亿美元的燃油犯罪计划
item.description: 巴西联邦警察开展了大规模行动，打击该国燃料供应链中的有组织犯罪，揭露了总额超过 230 亿雷亚尔（42 亿美元）的非法交易。【原文：Brazil’s Federal Police launched sweeping operations to crack down on organized crime in the country’s fuel supply chain, exposing illicit transactions totaling more than 23 billion reais ($4.2 billion).】
